post.description: Inserts a custom manga into the database.

patch.description: Updates a custom manga last read chapter in the database. If chapter not in body, set the last read chapter to the last released chapter if it exists, else set it to none. If both `chapter` and `chapter_url` are empty strings in the body, deletes the manga's last read chapter. You can't provide only the chapter_url. You must provide either the manga ID or the manga URL.
patch.summary: Update custom manga last read chapter

patch.description: Update custom manga last released chapter selectors.
patch.summary: Update custom manga last released chapter selectors

patch.description: Updates a custom manga name in the database. You must provide either the manga ID or the manga URL.

post.description: Update the dashboard configs in the DB. Cannot update version.

get.description: Returns the last error that happened in the background. Usually used to display the error in the dashboard.

delete.description: Deletes the last error that happened in the background. Usually used to clear the error in the dashboard.

get.description: Returns the last time a resource that should trigger an update in the iframe/dashboard was updated. Usually used to update the dashboard when an event not triggered by the user occurs.
Gets a manga from the database. You must provide either the manga ID or the manga URL.

post.description: Gets a manga metadata from source and inserts into the database.

delete.description: Deletes a manga from the database. You must provide either the manga ID or the manga URL.

get.description: Get a manga chapters from the source. You must provide either the manga ID or the manga URL.

patch.description: Updates a manga/custom manga cover image in the database. You must provide either the manga ID or the manga URL. You must provide only one of the following: cover_img, cover_img_url, get_cover_img_from_source. If it's a custom manga, using get_cover_img_from_source will return an error message.

parameters.description: Manga cover image file. Remember to set the Content-Type header to 'multipart/form-data' when sending the request.
parameters.name: cover_img

parameters.description: Let Mantium fetch the cover image from the source site
parameters.name: get_cover_img_from_source

parameters.description: Update manga cover image to  Mantium's default cover image
parameters.name: use_mantium_default_img

get.description: Gets the metadata for a manga from the source site.

patch.description: Updates a manga status in the database. You must provide either the manga ID or the manga URL.
Updates a custom manga URL in the database. You must provide either the manga ID or the manga current URL.

get.description: Gets the current manga of multimangas and all custom mangas.

post.description: Add the multimangas' current manga to Kaizoku. If it fails to add a manga, it will continue with the next manga. This is a heavy operation depending on the number of mangas in the database.

parameters.description: Filter which mangas to add by status. 1=reading, 2=completed, 3=on hold, 4=dropped, 5=plan to read. Example: status=1,2,3,5
parameters.name: status

post.description: Add the multimangas' current manga to Suwayomi. If it fails to add a manga, it will continue with the next manga. This is a heavy operation depending on the number of mangas in the database.

parameters.description: Filter which mangas to add by status. 1=reading, 2=completed, 3=on hold, 4=dropped, 5=plan to read. Example: status=1,2,3,5
parameters.name: status

post.description: Add the multimangas' current manga to Tranga. If it fails to add a manga, it will continue with the next manga. This is a heavy operation depending on the number of mangas in the database. Currently, only MangaDex mangas can be added to Tranga, but it'll try all mangas anyway.

parameters.description: Filter which mangas to add by status. 1=reading, 2=completed, 3=on hold, 4=dropped, 5=plan to read. Example: status=1,2,3,5
parameters.name: status

get.description: Returns an iFrame with mangas. Only mangas with unread chapters, and status reading or completed. Sort by last released chapter date.

parameters.description: API URL used by your browser. Used for the button that updates the last read chater, as your browser needs to send a request to the API to update the chapter.
parameters.name: api_url

parameters.description: IFrame theme, defaults to light. If it's different from your dashboard theme, the background turns may turn white
parameters.name: theme

parameters.description: Limits the number of items in the iFrame.
parameters.name: limit

parameters.description: If true, shows a warning in the iFrame if an error occurred in the background. Defaults to true.
parameters.name: showBackgroundErrorWarning

patch.description: Get the mangas metadata from the sources and update them in the database.

parameters.description: Notify if a new chapter was released for the manga (only of mangas with status reading or completed).
parameters.name: notify

post.description: Searches a manga in the source. You must provide the source name like "mangadex" and the search query.

get.description: Get the library stats from all multimangas and custom mangas.
Gets a multimanga from the database.

post.description: Gets a manga metadata from source and inserts it as the current manga of a new multimanga into the database.

delete.description: Deletes a multimanga from the database.

get.description: Get chapters of the current manga of a multimanga from the source.
Check a multimanga mangas and returns which manga should be the current manga.

parameters.description: Manga IDs to exclude from the check
parameters.name: exclude_manga_ids

patch.description: Updates a multimanga cover image in the database. You must provide only one of the following: cover_img, cover_img_url, use_current_manga_cover_img.

parameters.description: Multimanga cover image file. Remember to set the Content-Type header to 'multipart/form-data' when sending the request.
parameters.name: cover_img

parameters.description: Use the multimanga's current manga cover image
parameters.name: use_current_manga_cover_img

patch.description: Updates a multimanga last read chapter in the database. It also needs to know from which manga the chapter is from. If both `chapter` and `chapter_url` are empty strings in the body, set the last read chapter to the last released chapter in the database.

post.description: Adds a manga to a multimanga list in the database.

delete.description: Removes a manga from a multimanga list in the database.

patch.description: Updates a multimanga status in the database.

get.description: Gets all multimangas. The multimanga's mangas will have only the current manga. The current manga will have a possible wrong status, so use the multimanga's status.

chapter.description: Chapter usually is the chapter number, but in some cases it can be a one-shot or a special chapter

internalID.description: InteralID is a unique identifier for the chapter in the source

name.description: Name is the name of the chapter

updatedAt.description:
UpdatedAt is the time when the chapter was released or updated (read).
Should truncate at the second.
The timezone should be the default/system timezone.

url.description:
URL is the URL of the chapter
If custom manga chapter doesn't have a URL provided by the user, it should be like http://custom_manga/<uuid>.

coverImg.description: CoverImg is the cover image of the manga

coverImgFixed.description:
CoverImgFixed is true if the cover image is fixed. If true, the cover image will not be updated when updating the manga metadata.
It's used for when the cover image is manually set by the user.

coverImgResized.description: CoverImgResized is true if the cover image was resized

coverImgURL.description: CoverImgURL is the URL of the cover image

internalID.description: InteralID is a unique identifier for the manga in the source

lastReadChapter.description:
LastReadChapter is the last chapter read by the user
In a custom manga, this field represents the next manga the user should read
or, if it's equal to the last released chapter, the manga is considered read.

lastReleasedChapter.description:
LastReleasedChapter is the last chapter released by the source
If the custom manga has no more released chapter, it'll be equal to the LastReadChapter.

lastReleasedChapterNameSelector.description: LastReleasedChapterNameSelector is the selector used to find the last released chapter name in the source website

lastReleasedChapterURLSelector.description: LastReleasedChapterURLSelector is the selector used to find the last released chapter URL in the source website

multiMangaID.description: When the manga is part of a multimanga, this field should be set to the multimanga ID

name.description: Name is the name of the manga

preferredGroup.description:
PreferredGroup is the preferred group that translates (and more) the manga.
Not all sources have multiple groups. Currently not used.

searchNames.description:
SearchNames should be the multimanga's mangas names.
Used for searching mangas by name.

source.description:
Source is the source of the manga, usually the domain of the website.
If source is the above CustomMangaSource const, it means the manga is a custom manga created by the user.
and without a source site.

url.description:
URL is the URL of the manga.
If custom manga doesn't have a URL provided by the user, it should be like above CustomMangaSource/<uuid>.

coverImg.description: CoverImg is the cover image of the multimanga

coverImgFixed.description:
CoverImgFixed is true if the cover image is fixed. If false (default) the current manga's cover image should be used.
Else, use the multimanga's cover image fields.
It's used for when the cover image is manually set by the user.

coverImgResized.description: CoverImgResized is true if the cover image was resized

coverImgURL.description: CoverImgURL is the URL of the cover image

status.description: All mangas in the multimanga should have the same status
